Definitions: You will be given some input text and you need to classify the intent of the text.
Given an input, classify the intent of the input text.
Select the correct intent of the given input text from a list of options.

Intent Descriptions.description: an intent related to restrictions or issues when trying to add or send money to a beneficiary.
an intent related to inquiries regarding the maximum amount that can be added to an account within a certain timeframe.
an intent related to requests for obtaining an additional, secondary card linked to the same account.
an intent related to questions on how to acquire a one-time-use virtual card for secure online transactions.
an intent related to concerns related to a bank card that may have been lost, stolen, or subject to unauthorized use.
an intent related to issues where a card payment applied an incorrect exchange rate, affecting the transaction amount.
an intent related to situations where an attempted account top-up was reversed and the funds were not credited.
an intent related to assistance with problems or questions related to using a bank card at ATMs.
an intent related to procedures for changing the personal identification number (PIN) of a bank card.
an intent related to issues related to unsuccessful attempts to transfer money from the account.

Positive Examples.input: How can I tell if someone else is using my card?
I need a refund. This is not what i wanted.
Please tell me why I was charged additionally when I used the card.
Is there any cost to change foreign money to local?
How do you decide what the exchange rates are?
I made a payment but it's still pending
How much does it cost to get more cards?
I'm trying to make a bank transfer but It's not going through. Could there not be enough funds to transfer or something? Have I done it too many times?
Is there a way to see my money's source?
what are the exchange rates for foreign currency ATMs
